body_html:
Same error:

import torch
i = torch.LongTensor([[0, 1], [2, 0]])
v = torch.FloatTensor([3, 4])
sp = torch.sparse.FloatTensor(i, v, torch.Size([2,3]))
torch.cat((sp, sp))

TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-23-da5b036cb5b7> in <module>()
      3 v = torch.FloatTensor([3, 4])
      4 sp = torch.sparse.FloatTensor(i, v, torch.Size([2,3]))
----> 5 torch.cat((sp, sp))

TypeError: Type torch.sparse.FloatTensor doesn't implement stateless method cat`

body:
Same error:
```
import torch
i = torch.LongTensor([[0, 1], [2, 0]])
v = torch.FloatTensor([3, 4])
sp = torch.sparse.FloatTensor(i, v, torch.Size([2,3]))
torch.cat((sp, sp))
```
```---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-23-da5b036cb5b7> in <module>()
      3 v = torch.FloatTensor([3, 4])
      4 sp = torch.sparse.FloatTensor(i, v, torch.Size([2,3]))
----> 5 torch.cat((sp, sp))

TypeError: Type torch.sparse.FloatTensor doesn't implement stateless method cat`
